alert.note: Alert for Adams; Dunn; Grant; Hettinger; Sioux; Stark (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Frost Advisory issued September 21 at 7:02PM CDT until September 22 at 10:00AM CDT by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...FROST ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM CDT /2 AM MDT/ TO 10 AM CDT /9 AM MDT/ THURSDAY... ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM CDT /9 AM MDT/ TO 8 PM CDT /7 PM MDT/ THURSDAY... * WHAT...For the Frost Advisory, temperatures in the 32 to 37 degree range will result in areas of frost. For the Wind Advisory, southeast winds around 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Portions of south central and southwest North Dakota. * WHEN...For the Frost Advisory, from 3 AM CDT /2 AM MDT/ to 10 AM CDT /9 AM MDT/ Thursday. For the Wind Advisory, from 10 AM CDT /9 AM MDT/ to 8 PM CDT /7 PM MDT/ Thursday. * IMPACTS...For the Frost Advisory, frost could damage sensitive outdoor vegetation that is left unprotected. For the Wind Advisory, things left unsecured outside will be blown around.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. Strong winds can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.

area.areaDesc: Adams; Dunn; Grant; Hettinger; Sioux; Stark
